summary: An ordinance relating to and specifying and adopting a plan or system of additions and betterments to, and extensions of, the existing municipal light and power plant and system; providing for the construction and acquisition of a steam electric generating station of approximately 10,000 kilowatt capacity; declaring the estimated cost thereof, as near as may be; creating a special fund and transferring thereto the sum of Thirty-six Thousand ($36,000) by an appropriation from the surplus in the Light Fund, as a temporary advance to Capital Account, in order to defray the expense thereof; providing for the purchase of a steam turbo generator; and authorizing expenditures and appropriating funds therefor.
